trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows combo box control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 下拉式方塊控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> displays a text box combined with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, which enables the user to select items from the list or enter a new value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>顯示文字方塊中結合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，可讓使用者從清單中選取項目，或輸入新的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property specifies whether the list is always displayed or whether the list is displayed in a drop-down.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性會指定是否會永遠顯示清單，或是否顯示在下拉式清單中的清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property also specifies whether the text portion can be edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性也會指定是否可編輯的文字部分。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle> for the available settings and their effects.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>可用的設定和其效果。

trans-unit.source: There is no setting to always display the list and disallow entering a new value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有要永遠顯示清單，並且不允許輸入新值的設定。

trans-unit.source: To display a list to which no new values can be added, use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示可以加入任何新的值清單，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To add or remove objects in the list at run time, use methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>).
trans-unit.target: 若要新增或移除清單中的物件，在執行階段，使用方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection>類別 (透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>)。

trans-unit.source: You can assign an array of object references with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指派的物件參考陣列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The list then displays the default string value for each object.
trans-unit.target: 然後，此清單會顯示每個物件的預設字串值。

trans-unit.source: You can add individual objects with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入具有個別物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can delete items with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or clear the entire list with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以刪除的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或清除整個清單與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In addition to display and selection functionality, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> and to find text within the items of the list.
trans-unit.target: 除了顯示和選取的功能，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>也提供功能，可讓您有效率地將項目加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>並找出清單的項目內的文字。

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods, you can add a large number of items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，您可以加入的項目大量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>不用每次重繪控制項項目加入至清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法可讓您搜尋包含特定的搜尋字串的清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use these properties to manage the currently selected item in the list, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A> property to specify the string displayed in the editing field, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property to get or set the current item, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedItem%2A> property to get or set a reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些屬性來管理目前選取的項目在清單中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A>屬性來指定顯示在編輯的欄位中，字串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性來取得或設定目前的項目，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedItem%2A>来取得或設定屬性物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: If you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> on a base Windows Forms page and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived form, the string collections of those controls in the base form must be empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>Windows Form 頁面和想要修改這些控制項在衍生表單中的字串集合的基底，基底表單中的這些控制項的字串集合必須是空白。

trans-unit.source: If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another form.
trans-unit.target: 如果字串集合不是空的它們會變成唯讀時衍生另一種形式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a complete application showing how you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method to add items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A> method to find items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods to efficiently add a large number items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是完整的應用程式顯示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法，以將項目加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>方法來尋找項目中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法有效率地將大量項目以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: The ability to store values that are different from displayed text is inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: 能夠儲存不同的顯示文字的值都繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use this feature, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何使用這項功能的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: You must add references to the `System.Drawing` and `System.Windows.Forms` namespaces to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 您必須將參考加入`System.Drawing`和`System.Windows.Forms`命名空間，才能執行這個範例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The items to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified items to the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定項目至下拉式方塊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> to use when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource" /> property is set to <see langword="CustomSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="CustomSource" /> 時所使用的自訂 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> to use with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 要搭配 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource" /> 使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性來建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護的來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>所在 Url、 地址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If there are duplicate entries in the maintained source, automatic completion behaves unpredictably.
trans-unit.target: 如果維護來源中有重複的項目，自動完成的正常運作。

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性`CustomSource`才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性放在一起。

trans-unit.source: The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統可能會限制可同時顯示的自訂字串數目。

trans-unit.source: For strings that contain a forward slash (/) or backward slash (\\), automatic completion appends all characters only up to and including the slash.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含正斜線 （/） 或反斜線 (\\)，自動完成會附加只，且包含斜線的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an option that controls how automatic completion works for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選項，控制如何在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 中使用自動完成。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: The values are <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.Append" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.None" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.Suggest" />, and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend" />.
trans-unit.target: 這些值包括 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.Append" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.None" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.Suggest" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性來建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護的來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>所在 Url、 地址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If there are duplicate entries in the maintained source, automatic completion behaves unpredictably.
trans-unit.target: 如果維護來源中有重複的項目，自動完成的正常運作。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle.DropDownList>, the list displays only if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.Suggest> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle.DropDownList>，才會顯示清單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.Suggest>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend>。

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.CustomSource> in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.CustomSource>才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性放在一起。

trans-unit.source: With <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.ListItems>, the behavior is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.ListItems>，行為如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the list of strings is empty, pressing the BACKSPACE or DELETE key does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 字串清單是空的如果按退格鍵或 DELETE 鍵沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: If the BACKSPACE key is pressed in less than one second, the previous item is selected, or nothing is selected if the list of string is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下退格鍵時少於一秒中，選取一個項目時，或如果是空的字串清單選取任何項目。

trans-unit.source: If the BACKSPACE key is pressed in more than one second, the first item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果在超過 1 秒中，按下退格鍵時，會選取第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: If the DELETE key is pressed, the first item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下 DELETE 鍵時，會選取第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統可能會限制可同時顯示的自訂字串數目。

trans-unit.source: For strings that contain a forward slash (/) or backward slash (\\), automatic completion appends all characters only up to and including the slash.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含正斜線 （/） 或反斜線 (\\)，自動完成會附加只，且包含斜線的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the source of complete strings used for automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，以指定用於自動完成的完整字串來源。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: The options are <see langword="AllSystemSources" />, <see langword="AllUrl" />, <see langword="FileSystem" />, <see langword="HistoryList" />, <see langword="RecentlyUsedList" />, <see langword="CustomSource" />, and <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 這些選項包括 <see langword="AllSystemSources" />、<see langword="AllUrl" />、<see langword="FileSystem" />、<see langword="HistoryList" />、<see langword="RecentlyUsedList" />、<see langword="CustomSource" /> 和 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性來建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護的來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>所在 Url、 地址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.CustomSource> in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.CustomSource>才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性放在一起。

trans-unit.source: With <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.ListItems>, the behavior is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.ListItems>，行為如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the list of strings is empty, pressing the BACKSPACE or DELETE key does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 字串清單是空的如果按退格鍵或 DELETE 鍵沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: If the BACKSPACE key is pressed in less than one second, the previous item is selected, or nothing is selected if the list of string is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下退格鍵時少於一秒中，選取一個項目時，或如果是空的字串清單選取任何項目。

trans-unit.source: If the BACKSPACE key is pressed in more than one second, the first item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果在超過 1 秒中，按下退格鍵時，會選取第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: If the DELETE key is pressed, the first item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下 DELETE 鍵時，會選取第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統可能會限制可同時顯示的自訂字串數目。

trans-unit.source: For strings that contain a forward slash (/) or backward slash (\\), automatic completion appends all characters only up to and including the slash.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含正斜線 （/） 或反斜線 (\\)，自動完成會附加只，且包含斜線的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A color object that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 色彩物件，表示控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Maintains performance when items are added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> one at a time.
trans-unit.target: 當項目一次一筆加入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 時可維護效能。

trans-unit.source: This method prevents the control from painting until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會讓控制項繪製直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>).
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection>類別 (透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>)。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您一次加入清單的項目陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection>類別，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>每個項目新增至清單的時間。

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>來重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入這種方式可以防止重繪閃動繪製期間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>當正在大量項目加入至清單。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example is part of a complete code example in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 範例是完整的程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>類別概觀。

trans-unit.target: 建立控制項的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> to avoid multiple layouts during handle creation due to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> size change.
trans-unit.target: 在 覆寫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>以避免因為控制代碼建立期間的多個配置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>大小變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含建立控制項之控制代碼時所需的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface or an <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 介面的物件，或是 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A data source can be a database, a Web service, or an object that can later be used to generate data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源可以是資料庫、 Web 服務或稍後可以用來產生資料繫結控制項的物件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DataSource%2A> property is set, the items collection cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DataSource%2A>屬性設定，無法修改項目集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DataSource%2A> property to display an array of weekdays in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DataSource%2A>屬性顯示在工作日的陣列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於主控描繪 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 的視覺外觀變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is used by an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件由描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件來執行繪製項目所需的工作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you have a variable sized item (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=nameWithType>), before drawing an item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有變數的大小項目 (當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為`OwnerDrawVariable`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=nameWithType>)，繪製項目之前,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>事件，以指定要繪製的事件處理常式中的項目大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn combo box by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A> property to `OwnerDrawnVariable` and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> events.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主控描繪下拉式方塊，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性`OwnerDrawnVariable`和處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownClosed>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> named `ComboBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>名為`ComboBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownClosed> event.

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 下拉部分的高度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.target: 下拉式方塊的高度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A> property resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A>屬性重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.IntegralHeight%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小於 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the style of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定下拉式方塊樣式的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="DropDown" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="DropDown" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property specifies whether the list is always displayed or whether the list is displayed in a drop-down.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性會指定是否會永遠顯示清單，或是否顯示在下拉式清單中的清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property also specifies whether the text portion can be edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性也會指定是否可編輯的文字部分。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle> for the available settings and their effects.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>可用的設定和其效果。

trans-unit.source: There is no setting to always display the list and disallow entering a new value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有要永遠顯示清單，並且不允許輸入新值的設定。

trans-unit.source: To display a list to which no new values can be added, use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示可以加入任何新的值清單，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: 要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼在表單中。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeComboBox` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InitializeComboBox`表單的建構函式中的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> named `ComboBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>名為`ComboBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the of the drop-down portion of a combo box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定下拉式方塊下拉部分的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the drop-down box.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式方塊的寬度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: If a value has not been set for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A>, this property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 如果值已設定的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A>，這個屬性會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>下拉式方塊。

trans-unit.source: The width of the drop-down cannot be smaller than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> width.
trans-unit.target: 在下拉式清單的寬度不能小於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>寬度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn combo box by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A> property to `OwnerDrawnVariable` and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> events.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主控描繪下拉式方塊，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性`OwnerDrawnVariable`和處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: 要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼在表單中。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeComboBox` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InitializeComboBox`表單的建構函式中的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小於 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the combo box is displaying its drop-down portion.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出下拉式方塊是否正顯示它的下拉部分。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the drop-down portion is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果顯示下拉部分，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 false。

trans-unit.source: Resumes painting the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> control after painting is suspended by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate" /> 方法暫停繪製之後，繼續繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>).
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection>類別 (透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>)。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您一次加入清單的項目陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection>類別，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>每個項目新增至清單的時間。

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>來重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>當正在大量項目加入至清單。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example is part of a code example in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 範例是在程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 中以指定字串開頭之第一個項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 中以指定字串開頭之第一個項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到第一個項目之以零為起始的索引，如果沒有找到符合的，則傳回 -1。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數是要比較的下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字子字串。

trans-unit.source: The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, and returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋執行進行局部比對從文字的開頭開始，並傳回第一個項目在清單中符合指定的子字串。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行的工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字使用的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, you must use the version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A> method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字中的其他執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，您必須使用新版<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>方法提供的參數指定內的起始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A> method and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example is part of a complete code example in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 範例是完整的程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item before the first item to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋第一個項目之前，項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Set to -1 to search from the beginning of the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定為 -1 以便從控制項的開頭進行搜尋。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> beyond the specified index that contains the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 中指定索引位置之外包含指定字串之第一個項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The search is not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋是不區分大小寫的。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found, or 0 if the <paramref name="s" /> parameter specifies <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一個項目之以零為起始的索引；如果找不到相符項，則傳回 -1；如果 <paramref name="s" /> 參數指定 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，則傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數是要比較的下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字子字串。

trans-unit.source: The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會執行部分相符的文字，從頭開始在清單中符合指定的子字串中傳回第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行的工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字使用的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫使用這個方法不會指定起始索引版本之後，通常使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text.
trans-unit.target: 一旦在清單中找到的初始項目，這個方法通常用來進一步搜尋文字的執行個體指定尋找中的索引位置`startIndex`參數搜尋文字的第一個找到的執行個體後的項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="startIndex" /> is greater than the last index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 大於集合中的最後索引。

trans-unit.source: Finds the item that exactly matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 尋找完全符合指定字串的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the combo box that matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 尋找下拉式方塊中第一個完全符合指定字串的項目。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found, or 0 if the <paramref name="s" /> parameter specifies <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一個項目之以零為起始的索引；如果找不到相符項，則傳回 -1；如果 <paramref name="s" /> 參數指定 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，則傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a string to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數是要針對下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字進行比較的字串。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for a match starting from the beginning of the text, returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會尋找相符項目從文字的開頭開始傳回符合指定的子字串的清單中的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行的工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字使用的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, you must use the version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字中的其他執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，您必須使用新版<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法提供的參數指定內的起始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform partial word search instead of an exact word match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行部分文字搜尋，而不是正確的字相符項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MaxDropDownItems%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> properties and using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods to search the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.

trans-unit.target: `s`參數是要針對下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字進行比較的字串。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for a match starting from the beginning of the text, returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會尋找相符項目從文字的開頭開始傳回符合指定的子字串的清單中的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行的工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字使用的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫使用這個方法不會指定起始索引版本之後，通常使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text.
trans-unit.target: 一旦在清單中找到的初始項目，這個方法通常用來進一步搜尋文字的執行個體指定尋找中的索引位置`startIndex`參數搜尋文字的第一個找到的執行個體後的項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform partial word search instead of an exact word match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行部分文字搜尋，而不是正確的字相符項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is circular.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行之搜尋是循環。

trans-unit.source: Although the search starts at the next index after the `startIndex` parameter, the search restarts at 0 when the end of the collection is reached.
trans-unit.target: 雖然搜尋開始執行之後的下一個索引`startIndex`參數，從 0 重新到達集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: However, note that if the `startIndex` parameter itself is equal to the last index in the collection, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不過，請注意，如果`startIndex`參數本身是等於集合中最後一個索引，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MaxDropDownItems%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> properties and using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods to search the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>藉由設定控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MaxDropDownItems%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性，而且使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法來搜尋<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: It also shows handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 它也會顯示處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="startIndex" /> is equal to the last index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 等於集合中的最後一個索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the appearance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 的外觀。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一個列舉值，指定控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The options are <see langword="Flat" />, <see langword="Popup" />, <see langword="Standard" />, and <see langword="System" />.
trans-unit.target: 這些選項包括 <see langword="Flat" />、<see langword="Popup" />、<see langword="Standard" /> 和 <see langword="System" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Standard" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Standard" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FlatStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Flat> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Popup>, the drop-down arrow may be resized.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 4.5.2 中，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FlatStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Flat>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Popup>，可能會調整大小的下拉式箭號。

trans-unit.source: Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry:
trans-unit.target: 調整大小取決於系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目：

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> has focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示焦點是否在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this control has focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果焦點在這個控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to return the height of.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回其高度的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the height of an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 中項目的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引處的項目高度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A> is not set to `OwnerDrawVariable`, the value of the `index` parameter is ignored because all items in a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> are the same size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>未設定為`OwnerDrawVariable`，值`index`參數會被忽略，因為在標準的所有項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>大小都一樣。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property when you are using an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> to determine the size of any item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，當您使用描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>來判斷任何項目內的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying the height for items in an owner-drawn list, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 多個指定的項目高度主控描繪清單中的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="index" /> is greater than count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大於清單中項目的計數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should resize to avoid showing partial items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否應該重新調整大小以避免僅顯示部分項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the list portion can contain only complete items; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單部分只能包含完整項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，控制項會自動調整大小以確保不部分顯示項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want to maintain the original size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要維護的原始大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>根據表單的空間需求，將此屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> does not contain any items, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>不包含任何項目，這個屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A> property resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A>屬性重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.IntegralHeight%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `OwnerDrawVariable`, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`OwnerDrawVariable`，此屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是標準輸入按鍵或需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的按鍵是標準輸入按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.IsInputKey%2A> method returns `true` when the `keyData` parameter includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Return> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Escape> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DroppedDown%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.IsInputKey%2A>方法會傳回`true`時`keyData`參數包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Return>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Escape>值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DroppedDown%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of an item in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定下拉式方塊中的項目高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of an item in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式方塊的項目高度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `OwnerDrawFixed`, all items have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`OwnerDrawFixed`，所有項目具有相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode> property is set to `OwnerDrawVariable`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ItemHeight%2A> property specifies the height of each item added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode>屬性設定為`OwnerDrawVariable`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ItemHeight%2A>屬性會指定加入至每個項目高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Because each item in an owner-drawn list can have a different height, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method to get the height of a specific item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 由於在主控描繪清單中的每個項目可以有不同的高度，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.GetItemHeight%2A>方法來取得中特定項目的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ItemHeight%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> with items of variable height, this property returns the height of the first item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ItemHeight%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>可變高度的項目，這個屬性會傳回第一個項目的高度控制項中。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying the height for items in an owner-drawn list, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 多個指定的項目高度主控描繪清單中的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: The item height value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 項目高度值小於零。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object representing the collection of the items contained in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，代表包含於這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 中的項目集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection" /> representing the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection" />，代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可讓您取得的目前儲存在中的項目清單的參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 與這個參考中，您可以將項目加入、 移除項目，並取得集合中的項目計數。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> is typically used to display text items, you can add any object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>是通常用來顯示文字項目，您可以將任何物件加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the representation of an object in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> is the string returned by that object's <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言中的物件表示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>是該物件所傳回的字串<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to have a member of the object displayed instead, choose the member that will be displayed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property to the name of the appropriate member.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要有改為顯示之物件的成員，選擇將顯示設定的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>屬性設為適當的成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can also choose a member of the object that will represent the value returned by the object by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以選擇將代表藉由設定物件所傳回的值物件的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: 如需可以執行與項目集合之工作的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別參考主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to add a small number of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將少量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>項目。

trans-unit.source: If you need to add a large number of items, see the example at <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要新增項目數量龐大，請參閱在此範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Both examples are part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個範例所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items to be shown in the drop-down portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 下拉部分顯示的最大項目數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items of in the drop-down portion.
trans-unit.target: 下拉部分中項目的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The minimum for this property is 1 and the maximum is 100.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的最小值為 1，而最大值為 100。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MaxDropDownItems%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> properties and using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods to search the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>藉由設定控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MaxDropDownItems%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性，而且使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法來搜尋<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: It also shows handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 它也會顯示處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number is set less than one or greater than 100.
trans-unit.target: 最大數目設定為小於一或大於 100。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size that is the upper limit that the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)" /> method can specify.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)" /> 方法可以指定的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 類型的排序配對，代表矩形的寬度與高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of characters a user can type into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者可以在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 中輸入的字元數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters a user can enter.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以輸入的最大字元數。

trans-unit.source: Values of less than zero are reset to zero, which is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 小於零的值會重設為零 (亦即預設值)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs each time an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> item needs to be drawn and when the sizes of the list items are determined.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要繪製主控描繪 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 項目或已決定清單項目的大小時。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to specify the size an item is made before it is drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立指定大小的項目會繪製前的此事件的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn combo box by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A> property to `OwnerDrawnVariable` and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> events.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主控描繪下拉式方塊，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性`OwnerDrawnVariable`和處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: 要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼在表單中。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeComboBox` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InitializeComboBox`表單的建構函式中的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size that is the lower limit that the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)" /> method can specify.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted> is raised only when the user changes the combo box selection, or when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted>只有當使用者變更下拉式方塊選取項目，或是當您設定時就會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>。

trans-unit.source: However, depending on how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> is configured, and how the user changes the selected item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted> event may not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 不過，依據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>設定，以及使用者如何變更選取的項目，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted>可能不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>, but note that this event occurs whether the index is changed programmatically or by the user.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>，但請注意，會發生此事件以程式設計方式或使用者，是否要變更索引。
